objects.specification: A large rectangular floor panel with a warm wooden texture and subtle grain patterns. The surface has a smooth, slightly glossy finish, evoking a welcoming and natural ambience for the booth floor.

children.specification: A large rectangular branded banner with high-resolution company logo and signature brand colors. The banner material is a durable, matte-finish fabric that hangs flat, with crisp edges and even tension.

objects.specification: A full-height smooth white rear wall with a flat surface and clean finish, serving as the main backdrop of the booth.

children.specification: A colorful decorative poster featuring vibrant graphics and product imagery, printed on semi-gloss paper.

A modern reception counter with a high-gloss finish on the countertop, featuring a smooth front face emblazoned with a crisp company logo in contrasting colors. The structure is clean-lined with concealed storage behind.
